name: Gold Rush (Abe-54)
description:
This is my Final Game Project for my Intro To Game Programming Course. 
It is a dungeon crawler with minigames in each room.

Controls:

WASD / Arrow-Keys to move around

Left Click  to Shoot in Target Minigame

Programming - Abraham Rubio

Audio - Marlon Morales & Florian Stracker's Retro-Fit Adventure Music

Artwork - Yasmine Benjamin  & Krishna Palacio's Mini-Fantasy Dungeon Pack Tileset
